interestingFact: Japan has more than 5 million vending machines.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest in the world.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Egypt is home to the only remaining Wonder of the Ancient World – the Great Pyramid of Giza.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
Germany is known for having over 1,500 different types of sausages.
India is the world’s largest democracy.
South Africa has three capitals: Pretoria, Cape Town, and Bloemfontein.
Italy is home to the world’s smallest country, Vatican City.
Chocolate originated in Mexico, dating back to the ancient Mayan and Aztec civilizations.
